A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's like Rian Johnson saw all movies and thought: 
"Nah dont want that! I dont care! I do my own thing! 
Snoke? dont care! 
Phasma? Dont care! 
Jedi Master Luke? Dont care! 
Reys history? dont care! 
The force? whatever we want
Force training? why do you need training?

F the old fans\, Star Wars is for young kids\, we need fun\, we need comedy\, humor\, selling toys. Its not supposed to be serious! we dont care. It needs to be like superheros! We dont care about the history! Skywalkers? pff... dont care. The old should die!"
